title: Abhiko Admin Dashboard
shortDescription: A futuristic admin panel built with Next.js and Tailwind.
description: Abhiko Admin Dashboard is a fully responsive, dark-mode optimized dashboard built using modern technologies like Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. It offers elegant charts, tables, and reusable components tailored for fast development and beautiful UI.

title: E-commerce UI Kit
shortDescription: Complete UI pack for modern e-commerce stores.
description: The E-commerce UI Kit includes essential UI components such as product cards, carts, filters, search, and checkout flows. It's designed for scalability and integrates seamlessly into any modern Next.js eCommerce platform.

title: Portfolio Starter Kit
shortDescription: Modern portfolio template for devs and designers.
description: The Portfolio Starter Kit is a sleek and responsive portfolio template built with developers in mind. It includes animated sections, project grids, testimonials, and contact forms. Ideal for showcasing your personal or freelance work.

title: Startup Landing Page
shortDescription: Conversion-optimized landing page for SaaS and startups.
description: Startup Landing Page is crafted to drive conversions and highlight your product's key features. With built-in CTAs, testimonials, pricing sections, and responsive layouts, it's perfect for launching SaaS tools, mobile apps, or digital services.
